text: Baranya is an administrative county in Hungary. The capital and largest city of Baranya county is Pécs. It is in the southern part of the country. The county is on the border with Croatia. It also borders with the Hungarian counties Bács-Kiskun, Somogy and Tolna. In 2019, 360,704 people lived there. Its area is 4,430 km². Category:Counties of Hungary
title: Baranya County
